main event: A military jet observed a visual object moving rapidly like a meteorite in February 1963.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 seconds with the object observed at a very high altitude above the cloud layer., The object was described as being 15-16 feet in length., The position of the sighting was recorded at 44.55N 177.15W in the Pacific., The object left a trail similar to a meteor., Multiple Air Force commands were notified about the sighting.
